name: isAnonymousFeature
description: Toggle to show isAnonymous checkbox field in complainant and witness dialogs

name: noOfficerHistoryNoteFeature
description: Toggle to show radio buttons for officer allegation history and to hide officer history when none exists

name: HowDidYouHearAboutUsFeature
description: Toggle to enable how did you hear about us field on incident details

name: ReferralLetterAttachment
description: Toggle to enable attaching the referral letter to the case

name: caseDashboardPagination
description: Enables pagination of the cases on the dashboard
